raw akas.title: Truth Hunter Reported by Linda Moulton Howe

akas: Truth Hunter Reported by Linda Moulton Howe World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Truth Hunter Reported by Linda Moulton Howe World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: Revelations from Alien Encounters
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Whistleblowers Expose the Alien Agenda for Earth
2.plot: Join Linda Moulton Howe in this new episode of Truth Hunter. She conveys information collected from insiders about the alien presence on Earth.

3.title: Insiders Reveal the Alien Struggle for Humanity's Future
3.plot: Join Linda Moulton Howe in this new episode of Truth Hunter. She reports on continuing binary communications and what remote viewers have uncovered.

4.title: Rendlesham Forest: Three Strange Nights
4.plot: Join Linda Moulton Howe in this new episode of Truth Hunter as she begins an extensive exposé concerning the strange events of RAF Bentwaters/ Woodbridge.

5.title: Rendlesham Forest: Contact Is Made
5.plot: Linda Moulton Howe continues her examination into the strange events of Rendlesham Forest in December of 1980.

6.title: The Unheard Truth Behind Roswell's UFOs
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Rendlesham Forest: Binary Messages Decoded
7.plot: Linda Moulton Howe's exposé into the RAF encounters comes to a startling conclusion with an examination of the binary messages produced by Staff Sargent Penniston following his contact with an alien craft in Rendlesham forest.

8.title: Introduction to an Alien Taxonomy
8.plot: Linda Moulton Howe has a compiled a taxonomy of the many types of non-human entities which have visited our planet. Some are new to the planet, while others have interacted with humanity for over 70,000 years

9.title: Proof of Presidential Briefings on the Alien Presence
9.plot: Join Linda Moulton Howe in this new episode of Truth Hunter as we see documents which informed Reagan of five types of the alien presence on Earth.

10.title: U.K. Cover-Ups: From UFOs to UAPs
10.plot: Join Linda Moulton Howe in this new episode of Truth Hunter. Branches of the British government actively worked to conceal proof of alien activity.

11.title: Detailing the Government's Alien Taxonomy
11.plot: Join Linda Moulton Howe in this new episode of Truth Hunter as she digs deeper into the presidential briefings presented to Ronald Reagan on alien activity.

imdb.plot outline: Linda Moulton Howe has spent her life hunting the truth about alien activity and government cover-ups. And now in her new series, Truth Hunter, she brings to light details you may have never heard about prominent UFO cases and extraterrestrial contacts.
imdb.title: Truth Hunter
plot: Linda Moulton Howe has spent her life hunting the truth about alien activity and government cover-ups. And now in her new series, _Truth Hunter_ (qv), she brings to light details you may have never heard about prominent UFO cases and extraterrestrial contacts.
